title: Governance hygiene patchset for instance-1 build
notes: Conditional: only if governance/type mismatches block implementation; route changes via GovernanceChangePortal.

title: Local developer tooling (scripts, dev env bootstrap)
Deterministic state machines and transition validation
Context compilation rules (refs → deterministic context bundle)
Postgres schemas and migrations (event store, projections, graph)
Projection builder (read models from event streams)
Outbox publisher and NATS event publication
Evidence manifest v1 library + validation oracle
Restricted evidence handling (Infisical + envelope keys)
notes: Evidence containing secrets must follow restricted-vault + redacted-copy policy.

title: Core API endpoints (loops, iterations, candidates, runs)
Governance and portal-related API endpoints (approvals, freezes, exceptions, artifacts)
notes: Implements portal APIs; ensure UI/API remain non-binding—only record submissions/approvals.

title: Evidence API (upload, retrieve, associate with runs/candidates)
Loop governor service (SYSTEM event emission + budgets)
Reference worker bridge (IterationStarted → context → candidate proposal)
Oracle runner service (Podman + gVisor)
notes: Oracle integrity stop triggers (ORACLE_TAMPER/GAP/ENV_MISMATCH/FLAKE) are non-waivable; suite changes require portal approval.

title: Core oracle suite implementation (build/unit/schema/lint)
notes: Oracle integrity stop triggers (ORACLE_TAMPER/GAP/ENV_MISMATCH/FLAKE) are non-waivable; suite changes require portal approval.

title: Integration/e2e oracle suite (DB/MinIO/NATS/API/UI)
notes: Oracle integrity stop triggers (ORACLE_TAMPER/GAP/ENV_MISMATCH/FLAKE) are non-waivable; suite changes require portal approval.

title: Oracle integrity checks (TAMPER/GAP/FLAKE/ENV_MISMATCH)
notes: Oracle integrity stop triggers (ORACLE_TAMPER/GAP/ENV_MISMATCH/FLAKE) are non-waivable; suite changes require portal approval.

title: Portal workflows UI (approvals, exceptions, oracle suite changes)
notes: UI must not imply approval; must record portal submissions with stable identity.

title: Self-host deployment stack (compose/podman)
notes: Release portal required for artifacts promoted to self-host baseline / demo freeze.

title: Bootstrap/init scripts (DB, buckets, identity realm, secrets)
notes: Release portal required for artifacts promoted to self-host baseline / demo freeze.

title: Operational logging + minimal observability
notes: Release portal required for artifacts promoted to self-host baseline / demo freeze.

title: End-to-end harness (happy path)
notes: Release portal required for artifacts promoted to self-host baseline / demo freeze. E2E harness outputs should be eligible for FreezeRecord creation once gates pass.

title: End-to-end harness (failure modes: integrity + exception)
notes: Release portal required for artifacts promoted to self-host baseline / demo freeze. E2E harness outputs should be eligible for FreezeRecord creation once gates pass.
